de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.advancedProcessing

Class FeatureTableCombination

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.dataIntegration.sensor.workflows.UnifiedSensorWorkflow
      • de.tuberlin.dima.bdapro.advancedProcessing.FeatureTableCombination

  • public class FeatureTableCombination
extends UnifiedSensorWorkflow
    Flink workflow that combines the feature tables generated from sensor and weather data using a mapping feature table.

      • generateCombinedFeatureTable

        private static FeatureTable generateCombinedFeatureTable(org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env,
                                                         org.apache.flink.table.api.java.BatchTableEnvironment tEnv,
                                                         java.lang.String dataDirectory)
        Generates a combined feature table by combining the sensor and weather feature tables.

        Developer Note: This method uses precalculated filtered sensor data to avoid unnecessary computation and is kept for compatability.

        Parameters:
        env - An execution environment.
        tEnv - A table environment.
        dataDirectory - The base path of the data directory.
        Returns:
        the combined feature table.

      • generateCombinedFeatureTable

        public static FeatureTable generateCombinedFeatureTable(boolean useCached,
                                                        org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env,
                                                        org.apache.flink.table.api.java.BatchTableEnvironment tEnv,
                                                        java.lang.String dataDirectory)
        Generates a combined feature table by combining the sensor and weather feature tables.
        Parameters:
        useCached - Whether or not to load prefiltered data from file or load raw data and apply filtering directly.
        env - An execution environment.
        tEnv - A table environment.
        dataDirectory - The base path of the data directory.
        Returns:
        the combined feature table.

      • generateSensorStationMappingFeatureTable

        public static FeatureTable generateSensorStationMappingFeatureTable(java.lang.String dataDirectory,
                                                                    org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment env,
                                                                    org.apache.flink.table.api.java.BatchTableEnvironment tEnv)
        Creates the feature table mapping sensor locations to weather stations by loading the precalculated mapping data from disk.
        Parameters:
        dataDirectory - The base path of the data directory.
        env - An execution environment to use.
        tEnv - A table environment to use.
        Returns:
        the sensor station mapping feature table
